      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
            end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
            def self.load_plugins # :nodoc:
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
              return unless self.extensions.empty?
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
              seen = {}
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
              require "rubygems" unless defined? Gem
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
              Gem.find_files("minitest/*_plugin.rb").each do |plugin_path|
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                name = File.basename plugin_path, "_plugin.rb"
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                next if seen[name]
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                seen[name] = true
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                require plugin_path
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                self.extensions << name
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
            end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
            ##
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
            # This is the top-level run method. Everything starts from here. It
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
            # tells each Runnable sub-class to run, and each of those are
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
            # responsible for doing whatever they do.
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
            #
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
            # The overall structure of a run looks like this:
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            #
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
            #   Minitest.autorun
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
            #     Minitest.run(args)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
            #       Minitest.__run(reporter, options)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
            #         Runnable.runnables.each
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
            #           runnable.run(reporter, options)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
            #             self.runnable_methods.each
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
            #               self.run_one_method(self, runnable_method, reporter)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
            #                 Minitest.run_one_method(klass, runnable_method)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
            #                   klass.new(runnable_method).run
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
            def self.run args = []
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
              self.load_plugins unless args.delete("--no-plugins") || ENV["MT_NO_PLUGINS"]
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
              options = process_args args
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
              reporter = CompositeReporter.new
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
              reporter << SummaryReporter.new(options[:io], options)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
              reporter << ProgressReporter.new(options[:io], options)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
              self.reporter = reporter # this makes it available to plugins
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
              self.init_plugins options
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
              self.reporter = nil # runnables shouldn't depend on the reporter, ever
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
              self.parallel_executor.start if parallel_executor.respond_to?(:start)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
              reporter.start
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              begin
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                __run reporter, options
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              rescue Interrupt
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                warn "Interrupted. Exiting..."
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              end
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
              self.parallel_executor.shutdown
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
              reporter.report
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
              reporter.passed?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
            end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
            ##
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
            # Internal run method. Responsible for telling all Runnable
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
            # sub-classes to run.
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
            def self.__run reporter, options
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          16
          
              suites = Runnable.runnables.reject { |s| s.runnable_methods.empty? }.shuffle
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          11
          
              parallel, serial = suites.partition { |s| s.test_order == :parallel }
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              # If we run the parallel tests before the serial tests, the parallel tests
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              # could run in parallel with the serial tests. This would be bad because
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              # the serial tests won't lock around Reporter#record. Run the serial tests
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              # first, so that after they complete, the parallel tests will lock when
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              # recording results.
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          11
          
              serial.map { |suite| suite.run reporter, options } +
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                parallel.map { |suite| suite.run reporter, options }
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
            end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
            def self.process_args args = [] # :nodoc:
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              options = {
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                         :io => $stdout,
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                        }
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
              orig_args = args.dup
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
              OptionParser.new do |opts|
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                opts.banner  = "minitest options:"
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                opts.version = Minitest::VERSION
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                opts.on "-h", "--help", "Display this help." do
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  puts opts
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                  exit
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                opts.on "--no-plugins", "Bypass minitest plugin auto-loading (or set $MT_NO_PLUGINS)."
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                desc = "Sets random seed. Also via env. Eg: SEED=n rake"
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                opts.on "-s", "--seed SEED", Integer, desc do |m|
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                  options[:seed] = m.to_i
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                opts.on "-v", "--verbose", "Verbose. Show progress processing files." do
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                  options[:verbose] = true
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
                opts.on "-n", "--name PATTERN", "Filter run on /regexp/ or string." do |a|
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                  options[:filter] = a
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                opts.on "-e", "--exclude PATTERN", "Exclude /regexp/ or string from run." do |a|
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                  options[:exclude] = a
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                unless extensions.empty?
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  opts.separator ""
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  opts.separator "Known extensions: #{extensions.join(", ")}"
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  extensions.each do |meth|
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                    msg = "plugin_#{meth}_options"
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                    send msg, opts, options if self.respond_to?(msg)
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                  end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                begin
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  opts.parse! args
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                rescue OptionParser::InvalidOption => e
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                  puts
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  puts e
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                  puts
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                  puts opts
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                  exit 1
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
          
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                orig_args -= args
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              end
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
          
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
              unless options[:seed] then
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                srand
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                options[:seed] = (ENV["SEED"] || srand).to_i % 0xFFFF
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                orig_args << "--seed" << options[:seed].to_s
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
              srand options[:seed]
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
          
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
              options[:args] = orig_args.map { |s|
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          2
          
                s =~ /[\s|&<>$()]/ ? s.inspect : s
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
              }.join " "
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
              options
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
            end
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
          
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
            def self.filter_backtrace bt # :nodoc:
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
              backtrace_filter.filter bt
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
            end
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
          
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
            ##
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
            # Represents anything "runnable", like Test, Spec, Benchmark, or
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
            # whatever you can dream up.
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
            #
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
            # Subclasses of this are automatically registered and available in
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            # Runnable.runnables.
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
            class Runnable
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
              ##
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
              # Number of assertions executed in this run.
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :assertions
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
              ##
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
              # An assertion raised during the run, if any.
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :failures
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
              ##
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
              # The time it took to run.
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :time
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
              def time_it # :nodoc:
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          32
          
                t0 = Minitest.clock_time
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          32
          
                yield
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          32
          
                self.time = Minitest.clock_time - t0
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
              end
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
          
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
              ##
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
              # Name of the run.
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
              def name
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          96
          
                @NAME
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
              end
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
          
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
              ##
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
              # Set the name of the run.
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
          
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
              def name= o
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          64
          
                @NAME = o
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
              end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
              ##
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
              # Returns all instance methods matching the pattern +re+.
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
          
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
              def self.methods_matching re
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          25
          
                public_instance_methods(true).grep(re).map(&:to_s)
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
              end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
          
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
              def self.reset # :nodoc:
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
                @@runnables = []
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              end
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
          
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
              reset
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
          
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
              ##
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
              # Responsible for running all runnable methods in a given class,
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
              # each in its own instance. Each instance is passed to the
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
              # reporter to record.
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
              def self.run reporter, options = {}
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          10
          
                filter = options[:filter] || "/./"
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          10
          
                filter = Regexp.new $1 if filter.is_a?(String) && filter =~ %r%/(.*)/%
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
          
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          10
          
                filtered_methods = self.runnable_methods.find_all { |m|
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          32
          
                  filter === m || filter === "#{self}##{m}"
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
                }
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
          
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          10
          
                exclude = options[:exclude]
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          10
          
                exclude = Regexp.new $1 if exclude =~ %r%/(.*)/%
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          10
          
                filtered_methods.delete_if { |m|
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          32
          
                  exclude === m || exclude === "#{self}##{m}"
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
                }
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
          
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          10
          
                return if filtered_methods.empty?
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
          
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          10
          
                with_info_handler reporter do
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          10
          
                  filtered_methods.each do |method_name|
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          32
          
                    run_one_method self, method_name, reporter
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
                  end
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
                end
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
              end
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
          
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
              ##
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
              # Runs a single method and has the reporter record the result.
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          
          
              # This was considered internal API but is factored out of run so
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
              # that subclasses can specialize the running of an individual
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          
          
              # test. See Minitest::ParallelTest::ClassMethods for an example.
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
          
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1
          
              def self.run_one_method klass, method_name, reporter
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          32
          
                reporter.prerecord klass, method_name
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          32
          
                reporter.record Minitest.run_one_method(klass, method_name)
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
              end
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          
          
          
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          1
          
              def self.with_info_handler reporter, &block # :nodoc:
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          10
          
                handler = lambda do
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          
          
                  unless reporter.passed? then
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
                    warn "Current results:"
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
                    warn ""
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
                    warn reporter.reporters.first
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
                    warn ""
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
                  end
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
                end
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
          
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          10
          
                on_signal ::Minitest.info_signal, handler, &block
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          
          
              end
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          
          
          
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
              SIGNALS = Signal.list # :nodoc:
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
          
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
              def self.on_signal name, action # :nodoc:
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          42
          
                supported = SIGNALS[name]
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
          
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
                old_trap = trap name do
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
                  old_trap.call if old_trap.respond_to? :call
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
                  action.call
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          42
          
                end if supported
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          42
          
                yield
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          42
          
                trap name, old_trap if supported
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          
          
              end
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
          
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
              ##
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
              # Each subclass of Runnable is responsible for overriding this
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
              # method to return all runnable methods. See #methods_matching.
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          
          
          
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
              def self.runnable_methods
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
              end
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
          
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          
          
              ##
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
              # Returns all subclasses of Runnable.
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
          
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
              def self.runnables
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          16
          
                @@runnables
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
              end
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
          
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          1
          
              @@marshal_dump_warned = false
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          
          
          
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          1
          
              def marshal_dump # :nodoc:
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
                unless @@marshal_dump_warned then
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          
          
                  warn ["Minitest::Runnable#marshal_dump is deprecated.",
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
                        "You might be violating internals. From", caller.first].join " "
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
                  @@marshal_dump_warned = true
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          
          
                end
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
          
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
                [self.name, self.failures, self.assertions, self.time]
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
              end
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
          
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
              def marshal_load ary # :nodoc:
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          
          
                self.name, self.failures, self.assertions, self.time = ary
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
              end
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
          
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          1
          
              def failure # :nodoc:
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          96
          
                self.failures.first
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
              end
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          
          
          
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          1
          
              def initialize name # :nodoc:
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          64
          
                self.name       = name
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          64
          
                self.failures   = []
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          64
          
                self.assertions = 0
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          
          
              end
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          
          
          
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          
          
              ##
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          
          
              # Runs a single method. Needs to return self.
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          
          
          
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
              def run
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          
          
              end
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          
          
          
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          
          
              ##
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          
          
              # Did this run pass?
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          
          
              #
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          
          
              # Note: skipped runs are not considered passing, but they don't
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
              # cause the process to exit non-zero.
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          
          
          
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
              def passed?
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          
          
              end
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          
          
          
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          
          
              ##
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          
          
              # Returns a single character string to print based on the result
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          
          
              # of the run. One of <tt>"."</tt>, <tt>"F"</tt>,
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          
          
              # <tt>"E"</tt> or <tt>"S"</tt>.
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          
          
          
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          1
          
              def result_code
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          
          
              end
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          
          
          
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          
          
              ##
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          
          
              # Was this run skipped? See #passed? for more information.
        
      439. 
      
        
    439. 
          
          
          
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          1
          
              def skipped?
        
      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          
          
              end
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          
          
            end
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          
          
          
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          
          
            ##
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          
          
            # Shared code for anything that can get passed to a Reporter. See
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          
          
            # Minitest::Test & Minitest::Result.
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          
          
          
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          1
          
            module Reportable
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          
          
              ##
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          
          
              # Did this run pass?
        
      452. 
      
        
    452. 
          
          
              #
        
      453. 
      
        
    453. 
          
          
              # Note: skipped runs are not considered passing, but they don't
        
      454. 
      
        
    454. 
          
          
              # cause the process to exit non-zero.
        
      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          
          
          
        
      456. 
      
        
    456. 
          1
          
              def passed?
        
      457. 
      
        
    457. 
          32
          
                not self.failure
        
      458. 
      
        
    458. 
          
          
              end
        
      459. 
      
        
    459. 
          
          
          
        
      460. 
      
        
    460. 
          
          
              ##
        
      461. 
      
        
    461. 
          
          
              # The location identifier of this test. Depends on a method
        
      462. 
      
        
    462. 
          
          
              # existing called class_name.
        
      463. 
      
        
    463. 
          
          
          
        
      464. 
      
        
    464. 
          1
          
              def location
        
      465. 
      
        
    465. 
          
          
                loc = " [#{self.failure.location}]" unless passed? or error?
        
      466. 
      
        
    466. 
          
          
                "#{self.class_name}##{self.name}#{loc}"
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          
          
              end
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          
          
          
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          1
          
              def class_name # :nodoc:
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          
          
                raise NotImplementedError, "subclass responsibility"
        
      471. 
      
        
    471. 
          
          
              end
        
      472. 
      
        
    472. 
          
          
          
        
      473. 
      
        
    473. 
          
          
              ##
        
      474. 
      
        
    474. 
          
          
              # Returns ".", "F", or "E" based on the result of the run.
        
      475. 
      
        
    475. 
          
          
          
        
      476. 
      
        
    476. 
          1
          
              def result_code
        
      477. 
      
        
    477. 
          32
          
                self.failure and self.failure.result_code or "."
        
      478. 
      
        
    478. 
          
          
              end
        
      479. 
      
        
    479. 
          
          
          
        
      480. 
      
        
    480. 
          
          
              ##
        
      481. 
      
        
    481. 
          
          
              # Was this run skipped?
        
      482. 
      
        
    482. 
          
          
          
        
      483. 
      
        
    483. 
          1
          
              def skipped?
        
      484. 
      
        
    484. 
          32
          
                self.failure and Skip === self.failure
        
      485. 
      
        
    485. 
          
          
              end
        
      486. 
      
        
    486. 
          
          
          
        
      487. 
      
        
    487. 
          
          
              ##
        
      488. 
      
        
    488. 
          
          
              # Did this run error?
        
      489. 
      
        
    489. 
          
          
          
        
      490. 
      
        
    490. 
          1
          
              def error?
        
      491. 
      
        
    491. 
          
          
                self.failures.any? { |f| UnexpectedError === f }
        
      492. 
      
        
    492. 
          
          
              end
        
      493. 
      
        
    493. 
          
          
            end
        
      494. 
      
        
    494. 
          
          
          
        
      495. 
      
        
    495. 
          
          
            ##
        
      496. 
      
        
    496. 
          
          
            # This represents a test result in a clean way that can be
        
      497. 
      
        
    497. 
          
          
            # marshalled over a wire. Tests can do anything they want to the
        
      498. 
      
        
    498. 
          
          
            # test instance and can create conditions that cause Marshal.dump to
        
      499. 
      
        
    499. 
          
          
            # blow up. By using Result.from(a_test) you can be reasonably sure
        
      500. 
      
        
    500. 
          
          
            # that the test result can be marshalled.
        
      501. 
      
        
    501. 
          
          
          
        
      502. 
      
        
    502. 
          1
          
            class Result < Runnable
        
      503. 
      
        
    503. 
          1
          
              include Minitest::Reportable
        
      504. 
      
        
    504. 
          
          
          
        
      505. 
      
        
    505. 
          1
          
              undef_method :marshal_dump
        
      506. 
      
        
    506. 
          1
          
              undef_method :marshal_load
        
      507. 
      
        
    507. 
          
          
          
        
      508. 
      
        
    508. 
          
          
              ##
        
      509. 
      
        
    509. 
          
          
              # The class name of the test result.
        
      510. 
      
        
    510. 
          
          
          
        
      511. 
      
        
    511. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :klass
        
      512. 
      
        
    512. 
          
          
          
        
      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          
          
              ##
        
      514. 
      
        
    514. 
          
          
              # The location of the test method.
        
      515. 
      
        
    515. 
          
          
          
        
      516. 
      
        
    516. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :source_location
        
      517. 
      
        
    517. 
          
          
          
        
      518. 
      
        
    518. 
          
          
              ##
        
      519. 
      
        
    519. 
          
          
              # Create a new test result from a Runnable instance.
        
      520. 
      
        
    520. 
          
          
          
        
      521. 
      
        
    521. 
          1
          
              def self.from runnable
        
      522. 
      
        
    522. 
          32
          
                o = runnable
        
      523. 
      
        
    523. 
          
          
          
        
      524. 
      
        
    524. 
          32
          
                r = self.new o.name
        
      525. 
      
        
    525. 
          32
          
                r.klass      = o.class.name
        
      526. 
      
        
    526. 
          32
          
                r.assertions = o.assertions
        
      527. 
      
        
    527. 
          32
          
                r.failures   = o.failures.dup
        
      528. 
      
        
    528. 
          32
          
                r.time       = o.time
        
      529. 
      
        
    529. 
          
          
          
        
      530. 
      
        
    530. 
          32
          
                r.source_location = o.method(o.name).source_location rescue ["unknown", -1]
        
      531. 
      
        
    531. 
          
          
          
        
      532. 
      
        
    532. 
          32
          
                r
        
      533. 
      
        
    533. 
          
          
              end
        
      534. 
      
        
    534. 
          
          
          
        
      535. 
      
        
    535. 
          1
          
              def class_name # :nodoc:
        
      536. 
      
        
    536. 
          
          
                self.klass # for Minitest::Reportable
        
      537. 
      
        
    537. 
          
          
              end
        
      538. 
      
        
    538. 
          
          
          
        
      539. 
      
        
    539. 
          1
          
              def to_s # :nodoc:
        
      540. 
      
        
    540. 
          
          
                return location if passed? and not skipped?
        
      541. 
      
        
    541. 
          
          
          
        
      542. 
      
        
    542. 
          
          
                failures.map { |failure|
        
      543. 
      
        
    543. 
          
          
                  "#{failure.result_label}:\n#{self.location}:\n#{failure.message}\n"
        
      544. 
      
        
    544. 
          
          
                }.join "\n"
        
      545. 
      
        
    545. 
          
          
              end
        
      546. 
      
        
    546. 
          
          
            end
        
      547. 
      
        
    547. 
          
          
          
        
      548. 
      
        
    548. 
          
          
            ##
        
      549. 
      
        
    549. 
          
          
            # Defines the API for Reporters. Subclass this and override whatever
        
      550. 
      
        
    550. 
          
          
            # you want. Go nuts.
        
      551. 
      
        
    551. 
          
          
          
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          1
          
            class AbstractReporter
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          1
          
              include Mutex_m
        
      554. 
      
        
    554. 
          
          
          
        
      555. 
      
        
    555. 
          
          
              ##
        
      556. 
      
        
    556. 
          
          
              # Starts reporting on the run.
        
      557. 
      
        
    557. 
          
          
          
        
      558. 
      
        
    558. 
          1
          
              def start
        
      559. 
      
        
    559. 
          
          
              end
        
      560. 
      
        
    560. 
          
          
          
        
      561. 
      
        
    561. 
          
          
              ##
        
      562. 
      
        
    562. 
          
          
              # About to start running a test. This allows a reporter to show
        
      563. 
      
        
    563. 
          
          
              # that it is starting or that we are in the middle of a test run.
        
      564. 
      
        
    564. 
          
          
          
        
      565. 
      
        
    565. 
          1
          
              def prerecord klass, name
        
      566. 
      
        
    566. 
          
          
              end
        
      567. 
      
        
    567. 
          
          
          
        
      568. 
      
        
    568. 
          
          
              ##
        
      569. 
      
        
    569. 
          
          
              # Output and record the result of the test. Call
        
      570. 
      
        
    570. 
          
          
              # {result#result_code}[rdoc-ref:Runnable#result_code] to get the
        
      571. 
      
        
    571. 
          
          
              # result character string. Stores the result of the run if the run
        
      572. 
      
        
    572. 
          
          
              # did not pass.
        
      573. 
      
        
    573. 
          
          
          
        
      574. 
      
        
    574. 
          1
          
              def record result
        
      575. 
      
        
    575. 
          
          
              end
        
      576. 
      
        
    576. 
          
          
          
        
      577. 
      
        
    577. 
          
          
              ##
        
      578. 
      
        
    578. 
          
          
              # Outputs the summary of the run.
        
      579. 
      
        
    579. 
          
          
          
        
      580. 
      
        
    580. 
          1
          
              def report
        
      581. 
      
        
    581. 
          
          
              end
        
      582. 
      
        
    582. 
          
          
          
        
      583. 
      
        
    583. 
          
          
              ##
        
      584. 
      
        
    584. 
          
          
              # Did this run pass?
        
      585. 
      
        
    585. 
          
          
          
        
      586. 
      
        
    586. 
          1
          
              def passed?
        
      587. 
      
        
    587. 
          1
          
                true
        
      588. 
      
        
    588. 
          
          
              end
        
      589. 
      
        
    589. 
          
          
            end
        
      590. 
      
        
    590. 
          
          
          
        
      591. 
      
        
    591. 
          1
          
            class Reporter < AbstractReporter # :nodoc:
        
      592. 
      
        
    592. 
          
          
              ##
        
      593. 
      
        
    593. 
          
          
              # The IO used to report.
        
      594. 
      
        
    594. 
          
          
          
        
      595. 
      
        
    595. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :io
        
      596. 
      
        
    596. 
          
          
          
        
      597. 
      
        
    597. 
          
          
              ##
        
      598. 
      
        
    598. 
          
          
              # Command-line options for this run.
        
      599. 
      
        
    599. 
          
          
          
        
      600. 
      
        
    600. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :options
        
      601. 
      
        
    601. 
          
          
          
        
      602. 
      
        
    602. 
          1
          
              def initialize io = $stdout, options = {} # :nodoc:
        
      603. 
      
        
    603. 
          2
          
                super()
        
      604. 
      
        
    604. 
          2
          
                self.io      = io
        
      605. 
      
        
    605. 
          2
          
                self.options = options
        
      606. 
      
        
    606. 
          
          
              end
        
      607. 
      
        
    607. 
          
          
            end
        
      608. 
      
        
    608. 
          
          
          
        
      609. 
      
        
    609. 
          
          
            ##
        
      610. 
      
        
    610. 
          
          
            # A very simple reporter that prints the "dots" during the run.
        
      611. 
      
        
    611. 
          
          
            #
        
      612. 
      
        
    612. 
          
          
            # This is added to the top-level CompositeReporter at the start of
        
      613. 
      
        
    613. 
          
          
            # the run. If you want to change the output of minitest via a
        
      614. 
      
        
    614. 
          
          
            # plugin, pull this out of the composite and replace it with your
        
      615. 
      
        
    615. 
          
          
            # own.
        
      616. 
      
        
    616. 
          
          
          
        
      617. 
      
        
    617. 
          1
          
            class ProgressReporter < Reporter
        
      618. 
      
        
    618. 
          1
          
              def prerecord klass, name #:nodoc:
        
      619. 
      
        
    619. 
          32
          
                if options[:verbose] then
        
      620. 
      
        
    620. 
          
          
                  io.print "%s#%s = " % [klass.name, name]
        
      621. 
      
        
    621. 
          
          
                  io.flush
        
      622. 
      
        
    622. 
          
          
                end
        
      623. 
      
        
    623. 
          
          
              end
        
      624. 
      
        
    624. 
          
          
          
        
      625. 
      
        
    625. 
          1
          
              def record result # :nodoc:
        
      626. 
      
        
    626. 
          32
          
                io.print "%.2f s = " % [result.time] if options[:verbose]
        
      627. 
      
        
    627. 
          32
          
                io.print result.result_code
        
      628. 
      
        
    628. 
          32
          
                io.puts if options[:verbose]
        
      629. 
      
        
    629. 
          
          
              end
        
      630. 
      
        
    630. 
          
          
            end
        
      631. 
      
        
    631. 
          
          
          
        
      632. 
      
        
    632. 
          
          
            ##
        
      633. 
      
        
    633. 
          
          
            # A reporter that gathers statistics about a test run. Does not do
        
      634. 
      
        
    634. 
          
          
            # any IO because meant to be used as a parent class for a reporter
        
      635. 
      
        
    635. 
          
          
            # that does.
        
      636. 
      
        
    636. 
          
          
            #
        
      637. 
      
        
    637. 
          
          
            # If you want to create an entirely different type of output (eg,
        
      638. 
      
        
    638. 
          
          
            # CI, HTML, etc), this is the place to start.
        
      639. 
      
        
    639. 
          
          
            #
        
      640. 
      
        
    640. 
          
          
            # Example:
        
      641. 
      
        
    641. 
          
          
            #
        
      642. 
      
        
    642. 
          
          
            #   class JenkinsCIReporter < StatisticsReporter
        
      643. 
      
        
    643. 
          
          
            #     def report
        
      644. 
      
        
    644. 
          
          
            #       super  # Needed to calculate some statistics
        
      645. 
      
        
    645. 
          
          
            #
        
      646. 
      
        
    646. 
          
          
            #       print "<testsuite "
        
      647. 
      
        
    647. 
          
          
            #       print "tests='#{count}' "
        
      648. 
      
        
    648. 
          
          
            #       print "failures='#{failures}' "
        
      649. 
      
        
    649. 
          
          
            #       # Remaining XML...
        
      650. 
      
        
    650. 
          
          
            #     end
        
      651. 
      
        
    651. 
          
          
            #   end
        
      652. 
      
        
    652. 
          
          
          
        
      653. 
      
        
    653. 
          1
          
            class StatisticsReporter < Reporter
        
      654. 
      
        
    654. 
          
          
              ##
        
      655. 
      
        
    655. 
          
          
              # Total number of assertions.
        
      656. 
      
        
    656. 
          
          
          
        
      657. 
      
        
    657. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :assertions
        
      658. 
      
        
    658. 
          
          
          
        
      659. 
      
        
    659. 
          
          
              ##
        
      660. 
      
        
    660. 
          
          
              # Total number of test cases.
        
      661. 
      
        
    661. 
          
          
          
        
      662. 
      
        
    662. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :count
        
      663. 
      
        
    663. 
          
          
          
        
      664. 
      
        
    664. 
          
          
              ##
        
      665. 
      
        
    665. 
          
          
              # An +Array+ of test cases that failed or were skipped.
        
      666. 
      
        
    666. 
          
          
          
        
      667. 
      
        
    667. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :results
        
      668. 
      
        
    668. 
          
          
          
        
      669. 
      
        
    669. 
          
          
              ##
        
      670. 
      
        
    670. 
          
          
              # Time the test run started. If available, the monotonic clock is
        
      671. 
      
        
    671. 
          
          
              # used and this is a +Float+, otherwise it's an instance of
        
      672. 
      
        
    672. 
          
          
              # +Time+.
        
      673. 
      
        
    673. 
          
          
          
        
      674. 
      
        
    674. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :start_time
        
      675. 
      
        
    675. 
          
          
          
        
      676. 
      
        
    676. 
          
          
              ##
        
      677. 
      
        
    677. 
          
          
              # Test run time. If available, the monotonic clock is used and
        
      678. 
      
        
    678. 
          
          
              # this is a +Float+, otherwise it's an instance of +Time+.
        
      679. 
      
        
    679. 
          
          
          
        
      680. 
      
        
    680. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :total_time
        
      681. 
      
        
    681. 
          
          
          
        
      682. 
      
        
    682. 
          
          
              ##
        
      683. 
      
        
    683. 
          
          
              # Total number of tests that failed.
        
      684. 
      
        
    684. 
          
          
          
        
      685. 
      
        
    685. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :failures
        
      686. 
      
        
    686. 
          
          
          
        
      687. 
      
        
    687. 
          
          
              ##
        
      688. 
      
        
    688. 
          
          
              # Total number of tests that erred.
        
      689. 
      
        
    689. 
          
          
          
        
      690. 
      
        
    690. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :errors
        
      691. 
      
        
    691. 
          
          
          
        
      692. 
      
        
    692. 
          
          
              ##
        
      693. 
      
        
    693. 
          
          
              # Total number of tests that where skipped.
        
      694. 
      
        
    694. 
          
          
          
        
      695. 
      
        
    695. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :skips
        
      696. 
      
        
    696. 
          
          
          
        
      697. 
      
        
    697. 
          1
          
              def initialize io = $stdout, options = {} # :nodoc:
        
      698. 
      
        
    698. 
          1
          
                super
        
      699. 
      
        
    699. 
          
          
          
        
      700. 
      
        
    700. 
          1
          
                self.assertions = 0
        
      701. 
      
        
    701. 
          1
          
                self.count      = 0
        
      702. 
      
        
    702. 
          1
          
                self.results    = []
        
      703. 
      
        
    703. 
          1
          
                self.start_time = nil
        
      704. 
      
        
    704. 
          1
          
                self.total_time = nil
        
      705. 
      
        
    705. 
          1
          
                self.failures   = nil
        
      706. 
      
        
    706. 
          1
          
                self.errors     = nil
        
      707. 
      
        
    707. 
          1
          
                self.skips      = nil
        
      708. 
      
        
    708. 
          
          
              end
        
      709. 
      
        
    709. 
          
          
          
        
      710. 
      
        
    710. 
          1
          
              def passed? # :nodoc:
        
      711. 
      
        
    711. 
          1
          
                results.all?(&:skipped?)
        
      712. 
      
        
    712. 
          
          
              end
        
      713. 
      
        
    713. 
          
          
          
        
      714. 
      
        
    714. 
          1
          
              def start # :nodoc:
        
      715. 
      
        
    715. 
          1
          
                self.start_time = Minitest.clock_time
        
      716. 
      
        
    716. 
          
          
              end
        
      717. 
      
        
    717. 
          
          
          
        
      718. 
      
        
    718. 
          1
          
              def record result # :nodoc:
        
      719. 
      
        
    719. 
          32
          
                self.count += 1
        
      720. 
      
        
    720. 
          32
          
                self.assertions += result.assertions
        
      721. 
      
        
    721. 
          
          
          
        
      722. 
      
        
    722. 
          32
          
                results << result if not result.passed? or result.skipped?
        
      723. 
      
        
    723. 
          
          
              end
        
      724. 
      
        
    724. 
          
          
          
        
      725. 
      
        
    725. 
          
          
              ##
        
      726. 
      
        
    726. 
          
          
              # Report on the tracked statistics.
        
      727. 
      
        
    727. 
          
          
          
        
      728. 
      
        
    728. 
          1
          
              def report
        
      729. 
      
        
    729. 
          1
          
                aggregate = results.group_by { |r| r.failure.class }
        
      730. 
      
        
    730. 
          1
          
                aggregate.default = [] # dumb. group_by should provide this
        
      731. 
      
        
    731. 
          
          
          
        
      732. 
      
        
    732. 
          1
          
                self.total_time = Minitest.clock_time - start_time
        
      733. 
      
        
    733. 
          1
          
                self.failures   = aggregate[Assertion].size
        
      734. 
      
        
    734. 
          1
          
                self.errors     = aggregate[UnexpectedError].size
        
      735. 
      
        
    735. 
          1
          
                self.skips      = aggregate[Skip].size
        
      736. 
      
        
    736. 
          
          
              end
        
      737. 
      
        
    737. 
          
          
            end
        
      738. 
      
        
    738. 
          
          
          
        
      739. 
      
        
    739. 
          
          
            ##
        
      740. 
      
        
    740. 
          
          
            # A reporter that prints the header, summary, and failure details at
        
      741. 
      
        
    741. 
          
          
            # the end of the run.
        
      742. 
      
        
    742. 
          
          
            #
        
      743. 
      
        
    743. 
          
          
            # This is added to the top-level CompositeReporter at the start of
        
      744. 
      
        
    744. 
          
          
            # the run. If you want to change the output of minitest via a
        
      745. 
      
        
    745. 
          
          
            # plugin, pull this out of the composite and replace it with your
        
      746. 
      
        
    746. 
          
          
            # own.
        
      747. 
      
        
    747. 
          
          
          
        
      748. 
      
        
    748. 
          1
          
            class SummaryReporter < StatisticsReporter
        
      749. 
      
        
    749. 
          
          
              # :stopdoc:
        
      750. 
      
        
    750. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :sync
        
      751. 
      
        
    751. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :old_sync
        
      752. 
      
        
    752. 
          
          
              # :startdoc:
        
      753. 
      
        
    753. 
          
          
          
        
      754. 
      
        
    754. 
          1
          
              def start # :nodoc:
        
      755. 
      
        
    755. 
          1
          
                super
        
      756. 
      
        
    756. 
          
          
          
        
      757. 
      
        
    757. 
          1
          
                io.puts "Run options: #{options[:args]}"
        
      758. 
      
        
    758. 
          1
          
                io.puts
        
      759. 
      
        
    759. 
          1
          
                io.puts "# Running:"
        
      760. 
      
        
    760. 
          1
          
                io.puts
        
      761. 
      
        
    761. 
          
          
          
        
      762. 
      
        
    762. 
          1
          
                self.sync = io.respond_to? :"sync=" # stupid emacs
        
      763. 
      
        
    763. 
          1
          
                self.old_sync, io.sync = io.sync, true if self.sync
        
      764. 
      
        
    764. 
          
          
              end
        
      765. 
      
        
    765. 
          
          
          
        
      766. 
      
        
    766. 
          1
          
              def report # :nodoc:
        
      767. 
      
        
    767. 
          1
          
                super
        
      768. 
      
        
    768. 
          
          
          
        
      769. 
      
        
    769. 
          1
          
                io.sync = self.old_sync
        
      770. 
      
        
    770. 
          
          
          
        
      771. 
      
        
    771. 
          1
          
                io.puts unless options[:verbose] # finish the dots
        
      772. 
      
        
    772. 
          1
          
                io.puts
        
      773. 
      
        
    773. 
          1
          
                io.puts statistics
        
      774. 
      
        
    774. 
          1
          
                aggregated_results io
        
      775. 
      
        
    775. 
          1
          
                io.puts summary
        
      776. 
      
        
    776. 
          
          
              end
        
      777. 
      
        
    777. 
          
          
          
        
      778. 
      
        
    778. 
          1
          
              def statistics # :nodoc:
        
      779. 
      
        
    779. 
          1
          
                "Finished in %.6fs, %.4f runs/s, %.4f assertions/s." %
        
      780. 
      
        
    780. 
          
          
                  [total_time, count / total_time, assertions / total_time]
        
      781. 
      
        
    781. 
          
          
              end
        
      782. 
      
        
    782. 
          
          
          
        
      783. 
      
        
    783. 
          1
          
              def aggregated_results io # :nodoc:
        
      784. 
      
        
    784. 
          1
          
                filtered_results = results.dup
        
      785. 
      
        
    785. 
          1
          
                filtered_results.reject!(&:skipped?) unless options[:verbose]
        
      786. 
      
        
    786. 
          
          
          
        
      787. 
      
        
    787. 
          1
          
                filtered_results.each_with_index { |result, i|
        
      788. 
      
        
    788. 
          
          
                  io.puts "\n%3d) %s" % [i+1, result]
        
      789. 
      
        
    789. 
          
          
                }
        
      790. 
      
        
    790. 
          1
          
                io.puts
        
      791. 
      
        
    791. 
          1
          
                io
        
      792. 
      
        
    792. 
          
          
              end
        
      793. 
      
        
    793. 
          
          
          
        
      794. 
      
        
    794. 
          1
          
              def to_s # :nodoc:
        
      795. 
      
        
    795. 
          
          
                aggregated_results(StringIO.new(binary_string)).string
        
      796. 
      
        
    796. 
          
          
              end
        
      797. 
      
        
    797. 
          
          
          
        
      798. 
      
        
    798. 
          1
          
              def summary # :nodoc:
        
      799. 
      
        
    799. 
          1
          
                extra = ""
        
      800. 
      
        
    800. 
          
          
          
        
      801. 
      
        
    801. 
          
          
                extra = "\n\nYou have skipped tests. Run with --verbose for details." if
        
      802. 
      
        
    802. 
          1
          
                  results.any?(&:skipped?) unless options[:verbose] or ENV["MT_NO_SKIP_MSG"]
        
      803. 
      
        
    803. 
          
          
          
        
      804. 
      
        
    804. 
          1
          
                "%d runs, %d assertions, %d failures, %d errors, %d skips%s" %
        
      805. 
      
        
    805. 
          
          
                  [count, assertions, failures, errors, skips, extra]
        
      806. 
      
        
    806. 
          
          
              end
        
      807. 
      
        
    807. 
          
          
          
        
      808. 
      
        
    808. 
          1
          
              private
        
      809. 
      
        
    809. 
          
          
          
        
      810. 
      
        
    810. 
          1
          
              if '<3'.respond_to? :b
        
      811. 
      
        
    811. 
          1
          
                def binary_string; ''.b; end
        
      812. 
      
        
    812. 
          
          
              else
        
      813. 
      
        
    813. 
          
          
                def binary_string; ''.force_encoding(Encoding::ASCII_8BIT); end
        
      814. 
      
        
    814. 
          
          
              end
        
      815. 
      
        
    815. 
          
          
            end
        
      816. 
      
        
    816. 
          
          
          
        
      817. 
      
        
    817. 
          
          
            ##
        
      818. 
      
        
    818. 
          
          
            # Dispatch to multiple reporters as one.
        
      819. 
      
        
    819. 
          
          
          
        
      820. 
      
        
    820. 
          1
          
            class CompositeReporter < AbstractReporter
        
      821. 
      
        
    821. 
          
          
              ##
        
      822. 
      
        
    822. 
          
          
              # The list of reporters to dispatch to.
        
      823. 
      
        
    823. 
          
          
          
        
      824. 
      
        
    824. 
          1
          
              attr_accessor :reporters
        
      825. 
      
        
    825. 
          
          
          
        
      826. 
      
        
    826. 
          1
          
              def initialize *reporters # :nodoc:
        
      827. 
      
        
    827. 
          1
          
                super()
        
      828. 
      
        
    828. 
          1
          
                self.reporters = reporters
        
      829. 
      
        
    829. 
          
          
              end
        
      830. 
      
        
    830. 
          
          
          
        
      831. 
      
        
    831. 
          1
          
              def io # :nodoc:
        
      832. 
      
        
    832. 
          
          
                reporters.first.io
        
      833. 
      
        
    833. 
          
          
              end
        
      834. 
      
        
    834. 
          
          
          
        
      835. 
      
        
    835. 
          
          
              ##
        
      836. 
      
        
    836. 
          
          
              # Add another reporter to the mix.
        
      837. 
      
        
    837. 
          
          
          
        
      838. 
      
        
    838. 
          1
          
              def << reporter
        
      839. 
      
        
    839. 
          2
          
                self.reporters << reporter
        
      840. 
      
        
    840. 
          
          
              end
        
      841. 
      
        
    841. 
          
          
          
        
      842. 
      
        
    842. 
          1
          
              def passed? # :nodoc:
        
      843. 
      
        
    843. 
          1
          
                self.reporters.all?(&:passed?)
        
      844. 
      
        
    844. 
          
          
              end
        
      845. 
      
        
    845. 
          
          
          
        
      846. 
      
        
    846. 
          1
          
              def start # :nodoc:
        
      847. 
      
        
    847. 
          1
          
                self.reporters.each(&:start)
        
      848. 
      
        
    848. 
          
          
              end
        
      849. 
      
        
    849. 
          
          
          
        
      850. 
      
        
    850. 
          1
          
              def prerecord klass, name # :nodoc:
        
      851. 
      
        
    851. 
          32
          
                self.reporters.each do |reporter|
        
      852. 
      
        
    852. 
          
          
                  # TODO: remove conditional for minitest 6
        
      853. 
      
        
    853. 
          64
          
                  reporter.prerecord klass, name if reporter.respond_to? :prerecord
        
      854. 
      
        
    854. 
          
          
                end
        
      855. 
      
        
    855. 
          
          
              end
        
      856. 
      
        
    856. 
          
          
          
        
      857. 
      
        
    857. 
          1
          
              def record result # :nodoc:
        
      858. 
      
        
    858. 
          32
          
                self.reporters.each do |reporter|
        
      859. 
      
        
    859. 
          64
          
                  reporter.record result
        
      860. 
      
        
    860. 
          
          
                end
        
      861. 
      
        
    861. 
          
          
              end
