              ##
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              # Make diffs for this Test use #pretty_inspect so that diff
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              # in assert_equal can have more details. NOTE: this is much slower
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              # than the regular inspect but much more usable for complex
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              # objects.
        
      43.

      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              ##
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              # Call this at the top of your tests when you want to run your
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              # tests in parallel. In doing so, you're admitting that you rule
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              # and your tests are awesome.
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
              def self.parallelize_me!
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                include Minitest::Parallel::Test
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                extend Minitest::Parallel::Test::ClassMethods
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              ##
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              # Returns all instance methods starting with "test_". Based on
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              # #test_order, the methods are either sorted, randomized
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              # (default), or run in parallel.
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
              def self.runnable_methods
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          25
          
                methods = methods_matching(/^test_/)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          25
          
                case self.test_order
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                when :random, :parallel then
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          25
          
                  max = methods.size
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          89
          
                  methods.sort.sort_by { rand max }
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                when :alpha, :sorted then
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                  methods.sort

              ##
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              # Provides before/after hooks for setup and teardown. These are
        
      114.

              # meant for library writers, NOT for regular test authors. See
        
      115.

              module LifecycleHooks
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                ##
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                # Runs before every test, before setup. This hook is meant for
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                # libraries to extend minitest. It is not meant to be used by
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                # test developers.
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                #
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                # As a simplistic example:
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                #
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                #   module MyMinitestPlugin
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                #     def before_setup
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do before setup is run
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                #
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                #     def after_setup
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do after setup is run
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                #
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                #     def before_teardown
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do before teardown is run
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                #
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                #     def after_teardown
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                #       # ... stuff to do after teardown is run
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                #       super
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                #     end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                #   end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                #
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                #   class MiniTest::Test
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                #     include MyMinitestPlugin
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                #   end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                def before_setup; end

    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154.

      180.

                # run.

      187. 
      
        
    187.

                #
        
      189.

                # See #before_setup for an example.
        
      190.

          1
          
              def capture_exceptions # :nodoc:
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          128
          
                yield
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              rescue *PASSTHROUGH_EXCEPTIONS
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                raise
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              rescue Assertion => e
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                self.failures << e
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              rescue Exception => e
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                self.failures << UnexpectedError.new(e)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
              def with_info_handler &block # :nodoc:
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          32
          
                t0 = Minitest.clock_time
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          32
          
                handler = lambda do
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  warn "\nCurrent: %s#%s %.2fs" % [self.class, self.name, Minitest.clock_time - t0]
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          32
          
                self.class.on_signal ::Minitest.info_signal, handler, &block
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
              end

      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # all of this crap is just to avoid circular requires and is only
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # needed if a user requires "minitest/unit" directly instead of
        
      6. 
      
        
    6.
